```{r}
# Librerias:

se <- read.csv("~/CursoR/CursoRgit/Agronomia/Materiales/Germinacion sin esterilizar rabano.csv")
```

```{r}
# Grafico de semillas sin esterilizar
levels(se$Tratamiento)
se$Tratamiento=factor(se$Tratamiento,levels=c("Control","NAA","GA3", "Exuroot+ECCA M","Exuroot+ECCA SM"))
levels(se$Tratamiento)

g1 <- ggplot(se, aes(x = Tiempo, y = Semillas, group = Tratamiento, colour = Tratamiento))+
  theme_bw()+
  geom_line(size = 1)+
  ylab("")+
  xlab("Tiempo transcurrido")+
  labs(tag = "Fig. B")+
  theme(plot.tag = element_text(size = 12, color = "red", face = "bold"))+
  ggtitle("Semillas sin esterilizar")+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 18, color = "black", face = "bold"))+
  theme(axis.title.x = element_text(size = 15))+
  theme(axis.title.y = element_text(size = 15))+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 13))+
  theme(axis.text.y = element_text(size = 13))+
  theme(legend.title = element_text(size = 15))+
  theme(legend.text = element_text(size = 13))+
  ylim(2,9)

# Grafico de semillas esterilizadas
levels(est$Tratamiento)
est$Tratamiento=factor(est$Tratamiento,levels=c("Control","NAA","GA3", "Exuroot+ECCA M","Exuroot+ECCA SM"))
levels(est$Tratamiento)

g2 <- ggplot(est, aes(x = Tiempo, y = Semillas, group = Tratamiento, colour = Tratamiento))+
  theme_bw()+
  geom_line(size = 1)+
  ylab("Semillas germinadas")+
  xlab("Tiempo transcurrido")+
  ggtitle("Semillas esterilizadas")+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 18, color = "black", face = "bold"))+
  labs(tag = "Fig. A")+
  theme(plot.tag = element_text(size = 12, color = "red", face = "bold"))+
  theme(axis.title = element_text(size = 15))+
  theme(axis.text = element_text(size = 13))+
  theme(legend.title = element_text(size = 15))+
  theme(legend.text = element_text(size = 13))+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  ylim(2,9)
```
